trans-unit.source: Provides information about an event.
trans-unit.target: Gir informasjon om en hendelse.

trans-unit.source: An EventDescriptor consists of a name, its attributes, the component that the event is bound to, the event delegate, the type of delegate, and whether the delegate is multicast.
trans-unit.target: En EventDescriptor består av et navn, attributtene, komponenten hendelsen er bundet til, hendelsen representanten, hva slags representant, og om representanten multikastingsbyte.

trans-unit.source: EventDescriptor provides the following `abstract` properties and methods: - <xref:System.ComponentModel.EventDescriptor.ComponentType%2A> contains the type of the component this event is declared on.
trans-unit.target: EventDescriptor gir følgende `abstract` egenskaper og metoder:- <xref:System.ComponentModel.EventDescriptor.ComponentType%2A>inneholder komponenttypen denne hendelsen er deklarert på.</xref:System.ComponentModel.EventDescriptor.ComponentType%2A>

trans-unit.source: - <xref:System.ComponentModel.EventDescriptor.EventType%2A> contains the type of delegate for the event.
trans-unit.target: - <xref:System.ComponentModel.EventDescriptor.EventType%2A>inneholder typen representanten for hendelsen.</xref:System.ComponentModel.EventDescriptor.EventType%2A>

trans-unit.source: - <xref:System.ComponentModel.EventDescriptor.IsMulticast%2A> contains a value indicating whether the event delegate is a multicast delegate.
trans-unit.target: - <xref:System.ComponentModel.EventDescriptor.IsMulticast%2A>inneholder en verdi som angir om hendelsen representanten er en multikastings representant.</xref:System.ComponentModel.EventDescriptor.IsMulticast%2A>

trans-unit.source: - <xref:System.ComponentModel.EventDescriptor.AddEventHandler%2A> binds the event to a component.
trans-unit.target: - <xref:System.ComponentModel.EventDescriptor.AddEventHandler%2A>binding hendelsen til en komponent.</xref:System.ComponentModel.EventDescriptor.AddEventHandler%2A>

trans-unit.source: - <xref:System.ComponentModel.EventDescriptor.RemoveEventHandler%2A> unbinds the delegate from the component so that the delegate no longer receives events from the component.
trans-unit.target: - <xref:System.ComponentModel.EventDescriptor.RemoveEventHandler%2A>frigir representanten fra komponenten slik at representanten mottar ikke lenger hendelser fra komponenten.</xref:System.ComponentModel.EventDescriptor.RemoveEventHandler%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information about events, see [NIB: Raising an Event](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/f2adaf01-1ed1-42e1-8c31-8d467e7e0ee2).
trans-unit.target: Du finner mer informasjon om hendelser [NIB: opprettet en hendelse](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/f2adaf01-1ed1-42e1-8c31-8d467e7e0ee2).

trans-unit.source: For more information about reflection, see the topics in [Reflection](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon om gjenspeiling, kan du se emnene i [gjenspeiling](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.EventDescriptor"></xref> class with the name and attributes in the specified <xref href="System.ComponentModel.MemberDescriptor"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.ComponentModel.EventDescriptor"> </xref> klassen med navn og attributter i den angitte <xref href="System.ComponentModel.MemberDescriptor"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.ComponentModel.MemberDescriptor"></xref> that contains the name of the event and its attributes.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.ComponentModel.MemberDescriptor"> </xref> som inneholder navnet på hendelsen og attributtene.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.EventDescriptor"></xref> class with the name in the specified <xref href="System.ComponentModel.MemberDescriptor"></xref> and the attributes in both the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.MemberDescriptor"></xref> and the <xref:System.Attribute> array.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.ComponentModel.EventDescriptor"> </xref> klassen med navn i den angitte <xref href="System.ComponentModel.MemberDescriptor"> </xref> og attributter i begge den <xref href="System.ComponentModel.MemberDescriptor"> </xref> og <xref:System.Attribute>matrise.</xref:System.Attribute>

trans-unit.source: This constructor appends the attributes in the <xref:System.Attribute> array to the attributes in the <xref:System.ComponentModel.MemberDescriptor>.
trans-unit.target: Denne konstruktøren tilføyer attributtene i <xref:System.Attribute>matrisen slik at attributtene i <xref:System.ComponentModel.MemberDescriptor>.</xref:System.ComponentModel.MemberDescriptor> </xref:System.Attribute>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.ComponentModel.MemberDescriptor"></xref> that has the name of the member and its attributes.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.ComponentModel.MemberDescriptor"> </xref> som er navnet på medlemmet og attributtene.

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Attribute> array with the attributes you want to add to this event description.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Attribute>matrise med attributtene du vil legge til denne hendelsen beskrivelsen.</xref:System.Attribute>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.EventDescriptor"></xref> class with the specified name and attribute array.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.ComponentModel.EventDescriptor"> </xref> klassen med angitt navn og attributt matrisen.

trans-unit.source: The name of the event.
trans-unit.target: Navnet på hendelsen.

trans-unit.source: An array of type <xref:System.Attribute> that contains the event attributes.
trans-unit.target: En matrise av typen <xref:System.Attribute>som inneholder attributtene hendelsen.</xref:System.Attribute>

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, binds the event to the component.
trans-unit.target: Når overstyrt i en avledet klasse, binding hendelsen til komponenten.

trans-unit.source: Typically, this method is implemented through reflection.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden er vanligvis implementeres via gjenspeiling.

trans-unit.source: For more information about reflection, see the topics in [Reflection](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon om gjenspeiling, kan du se emnene i [gjenspeiling](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: For more information about delegates, see [NIB: Events and Delegates](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/d98fd58b-fa4f-4598-8378-addf4355a115).
trans-unit.target: Du finner mer informasjon om representanter [NIB: hendelser og representanter](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/d98fd58b-fa4f-4598-8378-addf4355a115).

trans-unit.source: A component that provides events to the delegate.
trans-unit.target: En komponent som inneholder hendelser til representanten.

trans-unit.source: A delegate that represents the method that handles the event.
trans-unit.target: Representant som representerer metoden som behandler hendelsen.

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, gets the type of component this event is bound to.
trans-unit.target: Når overstyrt i en avledet klasse, henter komponenttypen denne hendelsen er bundet til.

trans-unit.source: Typically, this property is implemented through reflection.
trans-unit.target: Denne egenskapen er vanligvis implementert via gjenspeiling.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Type> that represents the type of component the event is bound to.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Type>som representerer komponenttypen hendelsen er bundet til.</xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, gets the type of delegate for the event.
trans-unit.target: Når overstyrt i en avledet klasse, henter typen representanten for hendelsen.

trans-unit.source: Typically, this property is implemented through reflection.
trans-unit.target: Denne egenskapen er vanligvis implementert via gjenspeiling.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Type> that represents the type of delegate for the event.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Type>som representerer typen representanten for hendelsen.</xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, gets a value indicating whether the event delegate is a multicast delegate.
trans-unit.target: Henter en verdi som angir om hendelsen representanten er en multikastings representant når overstyres i en avledet klasse.

trans-unit.source: Typically, this property is implemented through reflection.
trans-unit.target: Denne egenskapen er vanligvis implementert via gjenspeiling.

trans-unit.source: A multicast delegate differs from a regular delegate in that it can contain references to more than just one method.
trans-unit.target: En multikastings representant er forskjellig fra en vanlig representant det kan inneholde referanser til mer enn bare én måte.

trans-unit.source: Methods in a multicast delegate are executed synchronously when the delegate is invoked, in the order in which they appear.
trans-unit.target: Metodene i en multikastings representant kjøres synkront når representanten aktiveres i rekkefølgen som de vises.

trans-unit.source: If one of the called methods raises an exception, then the delegate ceases and the exception is propagated to the delegate caller.
trans-unit.target: Hvis én av metodene kall viser et unntak, representanten lenger ikke, og unntaket overføres til oppkalleren representant.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the event delegate is multicast; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis hendelsen representanten multikastingsbyte; Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, unbinds the delegate from the component so that the delegate will no longer receive events from the component.
trans-unit.target: Når overstyrt i en avledet klasse, frigir representanten fra komponenten slik at representanten vil ikke lenger motta hendelser fra komponenten.

trans-unit.source: Typically, this method is implemented through reflection.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden er vanligvis implementeres via gjenspeiling.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the topics in [Reflection](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon, kan du se emnene i [gjenspeiling](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: For more information about delegates, see [NIB: Events and Delegates](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/d98fd58b-fa4f-4598-8378-addf4355a115).
trans-unit.target: Du finner mer informasjon om representanter [NIB: hendelser og representanter](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/d98fd58b-fa4f-4598-8378-addf4355a115).

trans-unit.source: The component that the delegate is bound to.
trans-unit.target: Representanten er bundet til en komponenten.

trans-unit.source: The delegate to unbind from the component.
trans-unit.target: Representanten ikke frigi fra komponenten.
